item.title: 越南第四号领导人将在腐败调查中辞职
item.description: 越南国会主席武永定顺（Vuong Dinh Hue）在其助理因腐败调查被拘留几天后辞职，熟悉此事的人士说。【原文：Vietnam’s National Assembly Chairman Vuong Dinh Hue has resigned days after his assistant was held in relation to a corruption probe, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 高盛和摩根士丹利为 CVC 的 Multiversity 筹资 10 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利和高盛集团等银行正在筹备近 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的债务融资，这将使收购公司 CVC Capital Partners 能够继续持有其大学投资项目之一 Multiversity。【原文：Banks including Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are lining up nearly €1 billion ($1.1 billion) of debt financing that will allow buyout shop CVC Capital Partners to hold on to Multiversity, one of its university investments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 诺伊尔称欧洲央行可能在某些季度与美联储脱节
item.description: 欧洲央行前决策者克里斯蒂安-诺耶（Christian Noyer）说，欧洲央行在降息前不必等待美联储，因为两者可能会有几个季度不同步。【原文：The European Central Bank doesn’t have to wait for the Federal Reserve before cutting interest rates as the two can be out of sync for several quarters, former policymaker Christian Noyer said.】

item.title: 全日空首席执行官与日本航空公司共同呼吁日元走强
item.description: 全日空控股公司（ANA Holdings Inc.与日本航空公司（Japan Airlines Co.【原文：ANA Holdings Inc. Chief Executive Officer Koji Shibata said ¥125 to the dollar is an ideal rate for the airline, joining the chief of Japan Airlines Co. in expressing concern over the Japanese currency’s slide to 34-year lows.】

item.title: KBW 称瑞银回购面临瑞士资本规则的风险
item.description: 据 KBW 分析师称，瑞士最近提出的新银行资本规则可能会削弱瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）进行股票回购的能力，从而削弱该公司对投资者的吸引力。【原文：New bank capital rules recently put forward by Switzerland may crimp UBS Group AG’s ability to carry out share buybacks, weakening the firm’s appeal for investors, according to KBW analysts.】

item.title: 前中央情报局官员解释如何识破商业谎言
item.description:
一种不同的尽职调查。【原文：

A different kind of due diligence.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 3 月份消费者通胀预期走低
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank —）的数据显示，欧元区消费者的通胀预期在3月份有所下降，这为未来几周启动货币宽松政策的计划提供了支持。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro zone inched down in March, according to the European Central Bank — supporting plans to kick off monetary easing in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 瑞士央行行长乔丹警告新的通胀冲击 "随时可能发生
中国股市吸引全球基金创纪录地流入 30 亿美元
item.description: 海外投资者周五购买了创纪录数量的在岸股票，市场对中国股市的情绪明显转好。【原文：Sentiment has clearly turned for the better toward Chinese equities with overseas investors purchasing a record amount of onshore shares Friday.】

item.title: Signa 同意将威尼斯标志性酒店出售给 Schoeller 集团
item.description: Signa Prime Selection AG 已同意将包括 Bauer 酒店在内的三处意大利物业出售给 Schoeller 集团。【原文：Signa Prime Selection AG has agreed to sell three Italian properties, including the Hotel Bauer, to the Schoeller Group.】

item.title: 数字代币摇摆不定，美国比特币 ETF 遭受最严重资金外流之一
item.description: 投资者从美国比特币交易所交易基金中净撤资 2.18 亿美元，这是最严重的单日资金外流之一，因为美联储降息的希望逐渐破灭，对风险投资的需求受到打击。【原文：Investors pulled a net $218 million from US Bitcoin exchange-traded funds, one of their worst daily outflows as demand for risky investments takes a knock from fading hopes for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 伊莱克斯因削减成本支撑盈利而大幅上涨；首席执行官将离职
item.description: 伊莱克斯公司（Electrolux AB）在斯德哥尔摩的交易中创下了今年以来的最大涨幅，此前这家瑞典家电制造商公布的盈利超出预期，并表示其首席执行官将在监督一项成本削减计划后离职。【原文：Electrolux AB jumped the most this year in Stockholm trading after the Swedish appliance maker reported earnings that beat estimates and said its chief executive officer will depart after overseeing a cost-cutting plan.】

item.title: 前卡莱尔日本公司高管为首支基金筹资 9.6 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：A former Carlyle Group Inc. executive in Japan has raised ¥150 billion ($960 million) from major banks and insurers for a new fund to invest in local companies, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国可能阻碍必和必拓成为铜的最大生产商
item.description: 必和必拓集团公司（BHP Group Ltd.）斥资 390 亿美元打造全球铜业巨头的计划有可能激怒其最大的客户中国，因为中国政府历来会出面干预，阻止或淡化国际兼并。【原文：BHP Group Ltd.’s $39-billion bid to create a global copper giant risks irking its biggest customer China, where authorities have a history of intervening to stymie or water down international mergers.】

item.title: 诺和诺德屹立不倒，Stellantis 顽强抵抗：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的迈克尔-沙（Michael Shah）说，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）蝉联欧洲最有价值公司的宝座，其第一季度报告 "没有让人失望的余地"。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S’s reign as Europe’s most valuable company “leaves no room to disappoint” with its first-quarter report, said Bloomberg Intelligence’s Michael Shah.】

item.title: 客户信心增强，NatWest 超预期
item.description: 由于有迹象表明客户信心有所改善，贷款和存款增加，NatWest Group Plc 第一季度盈利超出预期。【原文：NatWest Group Plc beat earnings estimates in the first quarter as lending and deposits increased amid signs of improving customer confidence.】

item.title: CVC Capital 与支持者在期待已久的上市活动中筹集 20 亿欧元资金
item.description: CVC Capital Partners 及其投资者在首次公开募股中募集了 20 亿欧元（21.5 亿美元），使欧洲著名私募股权公司之一拖延已久的上市进程得以解决。【原文：CVC Capital Partners and its investors raised €2 billion ($2.15 billion) in an initial public offering, bringing the long-delayed listing process for one of Europe’s marquee private equity firms to a resolution.】

item.title: 野村因固定收益交易和零售业繁荣而利润大增
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s earnings climbed as soaring fixed-income trading and resurgent markets in Japan helped Chief Executive Officer Kentaro Okuda achieve the first increase in annual profit under his watch.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司利润降幅低于预期，原因是石油价格上涨
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）公布的第一季度利润降幅小于预期，原因是石油市场的弹性部分抵消了天然气价格的下跌。【原文：TotalEnergies SE reported a smaller-than-expected drop in first-quarter profit as a resilient oil market partly offset lower gas prices.】

item.title: 港股迎来 12 年来的最佳一周，有望扭转颓势：图表
item.description: 中国股市本周表现抢眼，恒生指数有望创下 2011 年以来最好的一周。【原文：Chinese stocks are having a stunning week with the Hang Seng Index on track for its best week since 2011.】

item.title: 中国债券基金在疯狂购买中限制资金流入
item.description: 在全球第二大债券市场需求激增的情况下，中国越来越多的固定收益基金正在对投资者的资金流入设置限制，以管理预期。【原文：A growing number of fixed-income funds in China is setting limits on investor inflows, seeking to manage expectations amid a demand spike in the world’s second largest bond market.】

item.title: 盎格鲁拒绝必和必拓收购建议，认为其价值被严重低估
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）拒绝了必和必拓集团（BHP Group）提出的 390 亿美元收购建议，因为该建议 "严重低估 "了该公司及其未来前景。【原文：Anglo American Plc has rejected a $39 billion takeover proposal from BHP Group because it “significantly undervalues” the company and its future prospects.】

item.title: 新加坡对冲基金 APS 称创始人将辞去首席信息官一职
item.description: APS Asset Management Pte 创始人 Kok-Hoi Wong 准备在明年辞去这家新加坡对冲基金公司首席投资官的职务。【原文：APS Asset Management Pte founder Kok-Hoi Wong is preparing to step down as chief investment officer of the Singapore-based hedge fund in the coming year.】

item.title: 道达尔能源首席执行官表示，纳米比亚的石油资源可能需要与圭亚那类似的大型开发项目
item.description: 纳米比亚的石油潜力有朝一日可以与圭亚那相媲美，圭亚那的重大发现引发了经济转型，并让世界上最大的公司争相竞逐。【原文：Namibia’s oil potential could one day match Guyana, where big discoveries have sparked an economic transformation and set the world’s biggest companies jostling for position.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
越南监管机构否决新股票系统五月启动日期
item.description: 越南市场监管机构拒绝了胡志明市证券交易所关于启动新系统以加快交易清算速度的建议，推迟了当地投资者热切期待的升级。【原文：Vietnam’s market regulator rejected Ho Chi Minh City Stock Exchange’s proposal to start a new system to clear trades faster, delaying an upgrade that’s been eagerly anticipated by local investors.】

item.title: 日本央行债券持有量下降让市场感受到量化紧缩政策
item.description: 日本政府债券投资者已经尝到了日本央行量化紧缩政策的甜头。【原文：Investors in Japanese government bonds have already had a taste of quantitative tightening by the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 英国新建巨型液化天然气储罐为卡塔尔增加供应扫清障碍
item.description: 一个将在明年扩大英国天然气储存的项目被誉为欧洲能源安全的福音。对于海湾小国卡塔尔来说，这也是一个实质性的胜利。【原文：A project that will expand UK gas storage next year has been touted as a boon for Europe’s energy security. It’s also a substantial win for the small Gulf nation of Qatar.】

item.title: 分析师称日本央行鸽派决定为日元走弱铺平道路
item.description: 分析师称，日本央行周五基本维持货币政策设定不变，市场将认为这是一个鸽派举措，可能导致日元进一步走软。【原文：The Bank of Japan largely left its monetary policy settings unchanged Friday, which the market will see as a dovish move and likely to lead to further yen weakness, analysts say.】
